description.@en: The arts of grammar, rhetoric and logic are subtle, and it takes years of failure to become an expert in them.

effect.@en: Record this Talent name by your Skill Ranks— Trivium. Whenever you use a Skill that could be paired with Trivium (the study of grammar, logic and rhetoric), ignore any penalties your character is currently suffering from due to your Peril Condition Track. You also gain a +10% Base Chance to use the Skill when paired.
